Directions: In a slow cooker, combine the broccoli and ham. Combine the soup, cheese sauce, milk, rice, celery and onion; stir into the broccoli mixture. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until rice is tender.
Ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen broccoli cuts, thawed and drained
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
